Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Café Royal, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Piccadilly Theatre and Piccadilly Circus. This 5-star hotel is close to Trafalgar Square and Buckingham Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 160 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 8640 square feet (803 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piccadilly Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piccadilly Circus - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Shaftesbury Monument - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Academy of Arts - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Prince of Wales Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Queens Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Theatre Royal Haymarket - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Her Majesty's Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Leicester Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Trafalgar Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Prince Edward Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Wyndham's Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Spencer House - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
London Palladium Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.9 km / 8 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.1 km / 13.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Café Royal is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Those bookings with non-refundable cancellation policies cannot be amended or modified. / Las reservas no reembolsables no pueden ser modificadas.

PLEASE, NOTE THAT THE FOLLOWING ROOM TYPES INCLUDE COMPLIMENTARY SNACKS AND SOFT DRINKS FROM THE MINIBAR: GRAND JUNIOR SUITE, ONE BEDROOM SUITE, WESTMINSTER SUTIE, REGENT SUITE, OSCAR SUITE AND TUDOR SUITE. POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE LAS SIGUIENTES HABITACIONES INCLUYEN GRATUITAMENTE SNACKS Y BEBIDAS SIN ALCOHOL DEL MINIBAR
